short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to allow bridging of user events between Talos and Genesis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is to be used to link the Talos Event Management with the Genesis Video Alarm Management. The bridge ensures synchronization of alarms and the respective pictures between the two system in the operator screen. The extension works in the background and has no user interaction.
